sqlMap.insert: insert into board(seq, title, writer, content) values((select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 from board), #title#, #writer#, #content#)
sqlMap.update: update board set title=?, writer=?, content=? where seq=?
sqlMap.select: select * from board order by seq desc
sqlMap.update: update board set cnt=? where seq=?
sqlMap.select: select * from board where title like '%'||?||'%'
select * from board where content like '%'||?||'%'
